cs3500.music.control

Class SimpleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3500.music.control.SimpleController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockSimpleController

    public class SimpleController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController
    A simple controller to connect the view and the model.

      • SimpleController

        public SimpleController(MusicOperations model,
                        boolean playToLastBeat,
                        IView... view)
        Constructs a simple controller with a model, one or more views, and a default playing argument to allow the controller to immediately start playing.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to connect
        playToLastBeat - whether the controller should immediately play and terminate upon the reaching the last beat
        view - the views to connect

        public void control()
        Description copied from interface: IController

      • setKeyStrategy

        protected void setKeyStrategy()
        Sets the key strategy to use for handling keyboard input.
        LEFT/RIGHT - move the cursor left and right.
        SPACE - play through the piece.
        BACKSPACE/HOME - place cursor at start of piece.
        ENTER/END - place cursor at end of piece.
        A/D - decrease/increase tempo by 10%

      • setMouseStrategy

        protected void setMouseStrategy()
        Sets the mouse strategy to use for handling user mouse input.
        Mouse Click - activate note if practicing.
        Mouse Press - begin adding note to sheet based on tempo.
        Mouse Release - add note to sheet.
